94 struct CallbackReferenceCounter
95 {
100  bool early_unregister;
104  chaos::uint32 count;
108  CallbackReferenceCounter() : early_unregister(false), count(1) {}

128 class ScopedCallback
129 {
130 public:
131 
132  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
133  // CONSTRUCTORS
134  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
135 
136 // hide from doxygen
137 #ifndef IN_DOXYGEN
138 
149  ScopedCallback(
150  CallbackInterfaceBase* interface,
151  chaos::uint32 id,
152  CallbackReferenceCounter*& reference_counter)
153  :
154  m_ref_counter(new CallbackReferenceCounter()),
155  m_interface (interface),
156  m_id (id)
157  {
158  reference_counter = m_ref_counter;
159  }
160 
161 #endif
162 // IN_DOXYGEN
163 
167  ScopedCallback(TransientCallbackID transient)
168  :
169  m_ref_counter(new CallbackReferenceCounter()),
170  m_interface (transient.interface),
171  m_id (transient.id)
172  {
173  // pass the reference counter back to the interface
174  m_interface->add_reference_counter(m_id, m_ref_counter);
175  }
176 
183  ScopedCallback(const ScopedCallback& other)
184  :
185  m_ref_counter(other.m_ref_counter),
186  m_interface (other.m_interface),
187  m_id (other.m_id)
188  {
189  // increment the reference counter
190  ++m_ref_counter->count;
191  }
192 
193  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
194  // OPERATORS
195  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
196 
197  // delete the assignment operators
198  ScopedCallback& operator=(const ScopedCallback& other) = delete;
199 
200  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
201  // DESTRUCTOR
202  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
203 
204  ~ScopedCallback()
205  {
206  // reference counter should be non-zero
207  assert(m_ref_counter->count > 0);
208 
209  // decrement the reference counter and check if this is the last
210  // reference
211  if (--m_ref_counter->count == 0)
212  {
213  // does the callback need unregistering?
214  if (is_registered())
215  {
216  m_interface->unregister_function(m_id);
217  }
218  // clean up the reference counter
219  delete m_ref_counter;
220  }
221  }
222 
223  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
224  // PUBLIC MEMBER FUNCTIONS
225  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
226 
230  chaos::uint32 get_id() const
231  {
232  return m_id;
233  }
234 
243  bool is_registered() const
244  {
245  return !m_ref_counter->early_unregister;
246  }
247 
257  void unregister()
258  {
259  // there should be at least one instance!!
260  assert(m_ref_counter->count > 0);
261  // do nothing if the callback is already unregistered
262  if (is_registered())
263  {
264  m_interface->unregister_function(m_id);
265  m_ref_counter->early_unregister = true;
266  }
267  }
268 
269 private:
270 
271  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
272  // PRIVATE ATTRIBUTES
273  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
274 
278  CallbackReferenceCounter* m_ref_counter;
282  CallbackInterfaceBase* m_interface;
286  chaos::uint32 m_id;
287 };

355 template<typename... function_parameters>
356 class CallbackInterface : public CallbackInterfaceBase
357 {
358 private:
359 
360  CHAOS_DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN( CallbackInterface );
361 
362  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
363  // FRIENDS
364  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
365 
366  friend class ScopedCallback;
367  friend class CallbackHandler<function_parameters...>;
368 
369  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
370  // PRIVATE STRUCTURES
371  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
372 
377  union PermissiveFunction
378  {
383  void (*standard)(function_parameters...);
388  void (*member)(void*, function_parameters...);
389  };
390 
396  struct CallbackData
397  {
402  void* owner;
406  PermissiveFunction function;
407  };
408 
409 public:
410 
411  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
412  // DESTRUCTOR
413  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
414 
415  virtual ~CallbackInterface()
416  {
417  // ensure that any remaining callbacks are alerted that this object
418  // has been removed
419  CHAOS_FOR_EACH(it, m_scope_refs)
420  {
421  it->second->early_unregister = true;
422  }
423  }
424 
425  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
426  // PUBLIC MEMBER FUNCTIONS
427  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
428 
441  // TODO: update docs
442  TransientCallbackID register_function(
443  void (*callback_function)(function_parameters...))
444  {
445  // increment the global callback id and use it as this callback id
446  chaos::uint32 id = m_next_id++;
447  // this callback shouldn't be registered
448  assert(m_callback_funcs.find(id) == m_callback_funcs.end());
449  assert(m_scope_refs.find(id) == m_scope_refs.end());
450 
451  // store this function mapped under the id
452  CallbackData f;
453  f.owner = NULL;
454  f.function.standard = callback_function;
455  m_callback_funcs[id] = f;
456 
457  // return transient information about the callback
458  return TransientCallbackID(this, id);
459  }
460 
478  // TODO: update docs
479  template<typename owner_type,
480  void (owner_type::*function_type)(function_parameters...)>
481  TransientCallbackID register_member_function(owner_type* owner)
482  {
483  // increment the global callback id and use it as this callback id
484  chaos::uint32 id = m_next_id++;
485  // this callback shouldn't be registered
486  assert(m_callback_funcs.find(id) == m_callback_funcs.end());
487  assert(m_scope_refs.find(id) == m_scope_refs.end());
488 
489  // store this function mapped under the id
490  CallbackData f;
491  f.owner = owner;
492  f.function.member = member_wrapper<owner_type, function_type>;
493  m_callback_funcs[id] = f;
494 
495  // return transient information about the callback
496  return TransientCallbackID(this, id);
497  }
498 
499 private:
500 
501  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
502  // PRIVATE ATTRIBUTES
503  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
504 
509  chaos::uint32 m_next_id;
513  std::map<chaos::uint32, CallbackData> m_callback_funcs;
518  std::map<chaos::uint32, CallbackReferenceCounter*> m_scope_refs;
519 
520  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
521  // PRIVATE STATIC FUNCTIONS
522  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
523 
528  template<typename owner_type,
529  void (owner_type::*member_function)(function_parameters...)>
530  static void member_wrapper(void* owner, function_parameters... params)
531  {
532  (static_cast<owner_type*>(owner)->*member_function)(params...);
533  }
534 
535  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
536  // CONSTRUCTOR
537  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
538 
539  /*
540  * \brief Private default constructor.
541  */
542  CallbackInterface()
543  :
544  m_next_id(0)
545  {
546  }
547 
548  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
549  // PRIVATE MEMBER FUNCTIONS
550  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
551 
558  virtual void add_reference_counter(
559  chaos::uint32 id,
560  CallbackReferenceCounter* ref_counter)
561  {
562  // check the reference counter isn't registered
563  assert(m_scope_refs.find(id) == m_scope_refs.end());
564  // add to mapping
565  m_scope_refs[id] = ref_counter;
566  }
567 
575  virtual void unregister_function(chaos::uint32 id)
576  {
577  // ensure the id is associated with this interface
578  assert(m_callback_funcs.find(id) != m_callback_funcs.end());
579  assert(m_scope_refs.find(id) != m_scope_refs.end());
580 
581  // remove the id and function from the mappings
582  m_callback_funcs.erase(id);
583  m_scope_refs.erase(id);
584  }
585 
592  void trigger(function_parameters... params)
593  {
594  // iterate over the attached functions and call them
595  CHAOS_FOR_EACH(it, m_callback_funcs)
596  {
597  // member function?
598  if (it->second.owner != NULL)
599  {
600  it->second.function.member(it->second.owner, params...);
601  }
602  // standard function
603  else
604  {
605  it->second.function.standard(params...);
606  }
607  }
608  }
609 };
610
